title: Support Kinda Funny Games with Amazon Prime!
description:
Have Amazon Prime? Then, you have a FREE way to help http://www.twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames! Watch the video to learn how, and then, link your accounts here: https://twitch.amazon.com/prime

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

transcript_chunks.text: hey everybody it's me Greg and guess what twitch Prime is a thing what's twitch Prime it's Amazon Prime mixed up with twitch basically if you have Amazon Prime you have twitch Prime if you don't have Amazon Prime what the hell we talking about how great it is forever but what twitch Prime does right it gives you the benefits of the Amazon the two-day shipping all that other Jazz the discounts the games and it then gives you on Twitch game Goods add free viewing and a free subscription to give to a twitch person of your choice and that's what we're here to talk about if you look over here in the best friends everybody with a smiley face and the little white crown they are a twitch Prime member we are not on the air right now and they are giving us their subscriptions thank you all so much you're blowing our mind as we watch this happen now if you are not a twitch viewer maybe just like us on YouTube that's cool well if you're not a twitch viewer though why not come over and give us that

blowing our mind as we watch this happen now if you are not a twitch viewer maybe just like us on YouTube that's cool well if you're not a twitch viewer though why not come over and give us that go to twitch. amazon.com Prime you can link your accounts and then you can just give us a subscription and never come back and we would get the money from Amazon and it would pay for this studio that was really expensive
